Sharpclaws::

"Predacons against Predacons..." answered the male "Alliance killed 
Kitkat, who leaded Predacons, and Megatron started a battle to get 
the control instead organize Predacons... He wants destroy the most 
powerful warriors that Predacons have, that would mean that we would 
be defendless against our enemies... He betrayed again his allies... 
and our leader wants to stop this civil war before anything else 
happen" said Sharpclaws while he ran in vehicle mode towards the 
fight.



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Robert Dahl <rdahl@s...> wrote:
> "So, in this battle, who fights who" Stammers Scorponok at his new 
found
> allies.
